title: Gary Rotstein’s Morning File: There’s no place like home, especially in Pittsburgh
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Opinion - Today 
The front page of this newspaper Sunday reminded us of something frequently stated about Pittsburghers: We love it here....
